project_overview.description: An iOS app for habit tracking and self-discipline with gamified pet growth mechanics.

future_plans: Resume code development based on confirmed spec
Integrate real assets for pets instead of Emojis
Refine growth logic and add animations

session_logs.summary: Initialized project with SwiftUI and SwiftData. Created core models and views.
session_logs.changes: Created FocusApp.swift, Models/Habit.swift, Models/Pet.swift, Models/FocusSession.swift, Views/HomeView.swift, Views/AddHabitView.swift, Views/FocusView.swift, Views/ForestView.swift
Created Models and Views directories and populated them with Swift files.
